title: Whats the status on that new Diana skin?
body:
it feels like forever ago since the event
im just curious about it

replies.body: We're working on it! ^-^ To clarify, she was never intended to be released immediately after the All Star event.
Well what about the 2016 SKT Skins? What is their status?

They're probably almost done. Or done, and they're just waiting for the mid year All Star event, which is when they usually release new Team skins along with re-releasing old ones. The event is usually around May or June.

oh yeah i knew that

it just _feels_ like it's been forever
i was kind of hoping some cool concept art would've been leaked
(thats naughty though isnt it)
Last known status was it is in design phase.
